ComicInfo.Summary:
"This is AMAZING!"
–Chip Zdarsky, writer – Afterlift, Daredevil
AN EXCITING TASTE OF WHAT'S TO COME FROM SCOTT SNYDER'S BEST JACKETT PRESS AND COMIXOLOGY ORIGINALS
With EIGHT new titles releasing digitally starting in October 2021 and debuting in print beginning in 2022, Scott Snyder, the #1 New York Times best-selling writer, is returning to his creator- owned roots and collaborating with some of the biggest artists in comics, including Rafael Albuquerque, Greg Capullo, Francesco Francavilla, Jamal Igle, Jock, Tula Lotay, Francis Manapul, and Dan Panosian.
Massive in scope and creative range, these comics embrace all the things you love about Scott Snyder as a writer, while offering stories that are unexpected and new. Co-created with the best artists in the business, these books range from horror and sci-fi to historical fiction and the supernatural!
This sampler provides info and teaser images for:
WE HAVE DEMONS
CLEAR
NIGHT OF THE GHOUL
BARNSTORMERS
CANARY
THE BOOK OF EVIL
DUDLEY DATSON AND THE FOREVER MACHINE
DUCK AND COVER
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-29 05:03:21. [CVDB891054]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dan Panosian, Francesco Francavilla, Francis Manapul, Greg Capullo, Jamal Igle, Jock, Rafael Albuquerque, Tula Lotay
ComicInfo.Inker: Dan Panosian, Francesco Francavilla, Francis Manapul, Jock, Jonathan Glapion, Juan Castro, Rafael Albuquerque, Tula Lotay
ComicInfo.Colorist: Chris Sotomayor, Dan Panosian, Dave McCaig, Dee Cunniffe, Francesco Francavilla, Francis Manapul, Rafael Albuquerque
ComicInfo.Letterer: AndWorld Design, Bernardo Brice, Jock, Richard Starkings, Tom Napolitano
